entry.title: Steam (Loot) - The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Rush Week - Halloween Outfit Pack

ul.p: About the game (The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Rush Week - Towel Pack*):

ul.li: Description: Running for your life in sheer terror has never looked so good! This DLC pack gives the Towel outfit to the Rush Week Victims. Note - if you played Rush Week before October 22nd 2024, you already own this outfit.
